property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Through the haze of battle I saw the glint of sun on golden mane, the sheen of glory clad in mail, and I dropped my sword and wept at the idiocy of war." - Dravin, Gruul deserter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By the time your knees have worn through your robe, you may have begun to learn your place."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If one or more creature tokens would be created under your control, that many 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance are created instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile each creature you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I watched its blade swing through me, but I was hollow, empty. I saw its face contort in rage but could not hear it snarl." - Klattic, Boros legionnaire

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an opponent would mill one or more cards, they mill twice that many cards instead. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Copy Enchantment enter the battlefield as a copy of any enchantment on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Simic mages create redundant backups of their experiments to reduce the consequences of catastrophe.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand. Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Spark Double enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature or planeswalker you control, except it enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it if it's a creature, it enters with an additional loyalty counter on it if it's a planeswalker, and it isn't legendary.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a spell, return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He unmakes the world in his own image.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add an additional {B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal a card from your hand. Search your library for a card with the same name as that card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Hellbent - If you have no cards in hand, instead search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Lord of the Void deals combat damage to a player, exile the top seven cards of that player's library, then put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace When Massacre Girl enters the battlefield, each other creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Whenever a creature dies this turn, each creature other than Massacre Girl gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you've cast three or more instant and sorcery spells this turn, return Arclight Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample Whenever Hellkite Tyrant deals combat damage to a player, gain control of all artifacts that player controls. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more artifacts, you win the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Ilharg, the Raze-Boar attacks, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Return that creature to your hand at the beginning of the next end step. When Ilharg, the Raze-Boar dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Create X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens, where X is the number of Goblins you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He displays a perverse charisma fueled by avarice. Highly dangerous. Recommend civil sanctions." - Agmand Sarv, Azorius hussar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token. That token gains haste until end of turn and attacks this combat if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target card that's an instant or sorcery from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, copy it, and you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. Exile Mizzix's Mastery. Overload {5}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, create a 6/6 red Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fear of dragons is as old and as powerful as the fear of death itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Long ago, birds of paradise littered the skies. Thanks to the city's sprawl, most now exist as pets of society's elite.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Golgari Grave-Troll enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature card in your graveyard. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Golgari Grave-Troll: Regenerate Golgari Grave-Troll. Dredge 6 (If you would draw a card, you may mill six cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it doesn't have the same name as another creature you control or a creature card in your graveyard, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Simic's strength comes from its diversity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to three target land cards from your graveyard to your hand. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Protean Hulk dies, search your library for any number of creature cards with total mana value 6 or less, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose up to one target creature you control. Until end of turn, that creature gets +2/+0, gains trample if it's red, and gains vigilance if it's white.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Borborygmos Enraged deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Discard a land card: Borborygmos Enraged deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, Cindervines deals 1 damage to that player. {1}, Sacrifice Cindervines: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Cindervines deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Exile target land card from a graveyard. Add one mana of any color. {B}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard. Each opponent loses 2 life. {G}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Rakdos-controlled neighborhoods, everyone is part of the show.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, put two +1/+1 counters on Karlov of the Ghost Council. {W}{B}, Remove six +1/+1 counters from Karlov of the Ghost Council: Exile target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Does Teysa think me blind to her scheming? Ambition runs in our family."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent can't cast noncreature spells with mana value greater than the number of lands that player controls. Whenever an opponent casts a spell, if no mana was spent to cast it, counter that spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I told Jace that Ravnica would fall apart if he didn't take his responsibilities seriously. I didn't want to be right."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Lazav, the Multifarious enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) {X}: Lazav, the Multifarious becomes a copy of target creature card in your graveyard with mana value X, except its name is Lazav, the Multifarious, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it has this ability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, deathtouch Master of Cruelties can only attack alone. Whenever Master of Cruelties attacks a player and isn't blocked, that player's life total becomes 1. Master of Cruelties assigns no combat damage this combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Mindleech Mass deals combat damage to a player, you may look at that player's hand. If you do, you may cast a spell from among those cards without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Flying Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, Parun deals 1 damage to any target. Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, you draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prime Speaker Zegana enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the greatest power among other creatures you control. When Prime Speaker Zegana enters the battlefield, draw cards equal to its power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You can't cast this spell unless an opponent lost life this turn. Flying, trample Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each 1 life your opponents have lost this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you sacrifice a black creature, you may pay 2 life. If you do, each other player sacrifices a creature. Whenever you sacrifice a green creature, you may gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature's most raw beauty is the circle: perfect in its continuance, with no break between death and life."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain X life and draw X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the knowledge of absolute law inspire you to live a life of absolute order."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Quyzl was told by his mentor to "make more time" for his studies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to other creatures you control. {R}{W}: Tajic, Legion's Edge gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice three white creatures: Exile target creature. Whenever another black creature you control dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other green creatures you control get +1/+1. Other white creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Create Voja, a legendary 2/2 green and white Wolf creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is technically an ooze, but its lifespan measures only seconds. In that short time, its appetite for magic is extraordinary." - Simic research notes

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, exile all cards from your hand face down. At the beginning of your upkeep, return all cards you own exiled with Bottled Cloister to your hand, then draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color." {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dimir mages put the lanterns to good use, creating shapeshifters and sleeper agents from mana foreign to them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nonartifact permanent enters the battlefield under your control, you may return another permanent you control that shares a permanent type with it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It *wants* to remain a mystery, banishing the curious in favor of less inquisitive company.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an ability of equipped creature is activated, if it isn't a mana ability, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's easy to believe you're a god when you're twice as powerful as everyone else.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to equipped creature instead. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To bear the shield of the pariah is the highest honor a Boros can receive - and the last.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Seal of the Guildpact enters the battlefield, choose two colors. Each spell you cast costs {1} less to cast for each of the chosen colors it is.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd rather see the guilds contend together with words in the halls of power, than in the streets with swords." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as equipped creature is tapped, tapped creatures you control get +2/+0. As long as equipped creature is untapped, untapped creatures you control get +0/+2. {3}: You may tap or untap equipped creature. Equip {3}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {B} or {R}.) As Blood Crypt enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {G} or {U}.) As Breeding Pool enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {W} or {B}.) As Godless Shrine enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {W} or {U}.) As Hallowed Fountain enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {B} or {G}.) As Overgrown Tomb enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {R} or {W}.) As Sacred Foundry enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {U} or {R}.) As Steam Vents enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {R} or {G}.) As Stomping Ground enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {G} or {W}.) As Temple Garden enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.) As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pack Rat's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Rats you control. {2}{B}, Discard a card: Create a token that's a copy of Pack Rat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rest in Peace enters the battlefield, exile all graveyards. If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some corpses the Golgari cannot claim. Some souls the Orzhov cannot shackle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures can't attack you or planeswalkers you control unless their controller pays {X} for each of those creatures, where X is the number of enchantments you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Rakdos believe that all are eager to join their revels, even when told otherwise.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can come back once you've learned some manners - and figured out how to reconstitute your physical forms."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your library, then put a card from your hand on top of your library. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no knowledge that is not power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Gigantoplasm enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it has "{X}: This creature has base power and toughness X/X."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I appreciate things that exceed expectations." - Mizzix

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Narcomoeba is put into your graveyard from your library, you may put it onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What bait do you cast to catch a dream?" - Ravnican riddle

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose artifact, creature, or land. Tap all untapped permanents of the chosen type target player controls, or untap all tapped permanents of that type that player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creeping Chill deals 3 damage to each opponent and you gain 3 life. When Creeping Chill is put into your graveyard from your library, you may exile it. If you do, Creeping Chill deals 3 damage to each opponent and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pack Rat's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Rats you control. {2}{B}, Discard a card: Create a token that's a copy of Pack Rat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Replicate {R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.) Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a land card with a basic land type, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, untap all lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Walls crack. Buildings fall. Always the wilds return." - Domri Rade

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Niv-Mizzet Reborn enters the battlefield, reveal the top ten cards of your library. For each color pair, choose a card that's exactly those colors from among them. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Shambling Shell: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Destroy all creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Leonos had no second thoughts about the abolishment edict. He'd left skyrunes warning of the eviction, even though it was cloudy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Untap target creature that has an activated ability with {T} in its cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The stones hark back to an age before civilization, when the living earth blessed all who trod its untamed wilds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Pithing Needle enters the battlefield, choose a card name. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fearful want the procedure before a blood festival. The guilty seek it afterward.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can't protect everyone here. But those I can, I will." - Karn

property.name: Rules
property.value: Maze's End enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}, Return Maze's End to its owner's hand: Search your library for a Gate card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If you control ten or more Gates with different names, you win the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Thespian's Stage becomes a copy of target land, except it has this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Amid rumors of war, the third act of The Absolution of the Guildpact was quickly rewritten as a tragedy.
